full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNAM THAR SGO GSUM GYI RNAM PAR BZHAG PA LEGS BSHAD RGYA MTSO RBA RLABS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,CES RNAM THAR SGO GSUM GYI RNAM PAR BZHAG PA LEGS BSHAD RGYA MTSO'I RVA RLABS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SNGA SOR DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS SU DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL NGOR CUNG ZAD BRIS PA'I THOG ,THOS BSAM GLING GI GZHUNG GSAR 'DZIN GRA'I DGE 'DUN RNAMS NAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS TSUL GYI BSKUL MA BYUNG BAR BRTEN, ,KUN MKHYEN BLA MA'I LEGS BSHAD BEE d'URYA DKAR PO'I GAN MDZOD GYI KHA SKONGS SU DMIGS TE, CHOS SMRA BA'I BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES RANG LO NYER BDUN PA LA CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG, 'JAM MGON BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO PHYOGS DUS KUN DU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,RIGS LAM DRI MED TSA ZER GYIS, ,'GRO BLO'I MUN PA KUN SEL BA, ,MKHAS RNAM DGA' BYED RTA BDUN BDAG ,MCHOD SBYIN SBYAR GYI LHA LAM NGOS, ,'CHAR BYED RGYU SBYOR DANG STOBS LDAN, ,BLO BZANG LEGS LDAN LA SOGS PA'I, ,'GRO KUN MA RIGS MUN PA LAS, ,RGYAL TE THAR PA'I GRO MCHOG TU, ,RING MIN STOBS BCU'I RGYAL BA CHER, ,'KHOD TE 'GRO KUN SGROL BA LA, ,MI PHAM MGON DANG 'JAM DBYANGS KYI, ,RNAM THAR BDAG GIR BYED PAR SHOG , ,,CES SGO MANG GRA RIGS HAR CHEN JA SAG GUNG GI GSHOGS RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG LEGS LDAN NAS SPAR GYI SBYAR BYANG DGOS TSUL LTAR, ,RA SGRENG AA CHI THU NO MON HAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
